TopicTitle: Difficult to hit specific manuever orbital elements. No indication of expected results.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD 5000 series mobile | GPU: NVidia 3070 Mobile | RAM: 16GB

 

So just did a launch, got into orbit, wanted to refine to be better circularized. 

Created manuever node at the AP. Started pulling the prograde widget. There was no indication on the planned manuever projection as to where the new AP/PE points would be and no way to see their projected values.  

Basically there's no way to do any sort of refinement to get down to a good circular orbit without this sort of information.

 

With KSP1, you can at least go into the panel in the lower left, select manuever and see the projected AP/PE numbers in 1 place so you can fine tune things. Plus that widget was WAY better than trying to do it on the live map all the time (which is often very cluttered)
